author: Special Correspondent
text: Death toll in the road accident in which an omni bus overturned near Valliyoor in the district recently rose to eleven following the death of a four-year-old girl. When the bus, proceeding from Karaikal to Thiruvananthapuram, overturned at Pilakottaiparai near Valliyoor on January 8, nine persons were killed and 25 others injured. Four-year-old Aaron Biju, who was undergoing treatment at a hospital in Thiruvananthapuram, died on last Sunday. On Thursday night, Ebilin (4), who was in coma since the accident, succumbed to her injuries.
title: Accident death toll rises to 11
